${ModID}:DragonSoul.NAME: Dragon Soul
${ModID}:DragonSoul.FLAVOR: The refined soul of a higher being.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#c66c80]Demon [#c66c80]Soul. The first #b3 Attacks you play each combat are played twice.

${ModID}:DemonSoul.NAME: Demon Soul
${ModID}:DemonSoul.FLAVOR: The soul of a lesser demon flows through you.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Attack you play each combat is played twice.
